name: arkode-llm-platform
description: AnythingLLM instance for Arkode, deployed on Railway.

scripts.setup: npm install --prefix server --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix frontend --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix collector --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../server && npx prisma generate
scripts.migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.start: cd server && npm run migrate && NODE_ENV=production node index.js

author: Arkode
